page.title: 13ROBINSON'S PRINT SHOP
page.content: My dads shop has got three printing machines,a hand gilotene and a photocopier.We also have an electronic typewriter and an electric stapler. There are lots of racks to store all his paper which he gets from the United Paper Merchants and D.R.G.Ltd in Belfast.He sells a small selection of stationery which he buys from Hall and Forshaw in Belfast.He has got a plate making machine for the litho press and supplies of photographic materials and chemicals.The different inks come from Litho Supplies Belfast.He produces all kinds of commercial printing including business cards,letter headings_compliment slips,invoices,statements, order books and some of this is printed on carbonised paper.He also prints personal stationery like note paper and wedding invatations.
